explains: v. 过滤，滤去；萃取；被过滤，沥滤
n. 过滤，过滤过程；过滤器
wordGroup: leach liquor 沥滤液，浸出液；浸提液

sentences.en: Once the humus layer disappears, nutrients cannot be recycled and leach from the soil, converting soil from fertile to infertile and making it suitable only for savanna vegetation.
sentences.cn: 一旦腐殖质层消失，养分就无法从土壤中回收和过滤，致使土壤由肥沃变为贫瘠，只适于热带草原植被的生长。

sentences.en: Mr. Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
sentences.cn: 利奇先生在休假，没空作评论。

sentences.en: The teacher replied, "My dear sister, I tried my best to leach him, but your son did not want to lean the tricks and strategies of survival."
sentences.cn: 老师回答说：“好姐姐，我已经尽力了，可你儿子不愿学习生存的技巧和策略。”
